title: Saru Getchu: On Air (Ape Escape)
synopsis: An evil monkey, Specter, has escaped a circus, using a mind-controlling device which allows him to become smarter and have access to controlling the monkeys. Kakeru is called over by a professor in order to capture all the monkeys, including the one's who's controlling them: Specter.
related_anime: ['Letchu, Getchu, Saru Getchu', 'Saru Getchu: On Air 2nd']
voices: ['Kawakami, Tomoko', 'Sakamoto, Chika', 'Ishikawa, Shizuka', 'Hanba, Tomoe', 'Minagawa, Junko', 'Satou, Rina', 'Umezu, Hideyuki']
staff: [['Habara, Nobuyoshi', ['Director']], ['Arakawa, Naruhisa', ['Series Composition']], ['Sakai, Youichi', ['Music']], ['Wada, Toshiya', ['Sound Effects']]]
